0.2.name: wordpress/subpage-slider
0.2.description: The Subpage Slider plugin slides through sub-pages of any given parent page. The plugin user has the option of order of the subpages and it allows for repeating certian pages over. Each sub-page is refreshed using AJAX so it doesn't have to refresh the entire window. The user also has the option to show what the first link will be. After the slidesohw it cycles back to the first slide.
